org.digijava.kernel.ampapi.helpers.geojson

Interface PositionValidator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LonLatValidator

    public interface PositionValidator
    Interface for objects to be passed to the isValid method of the Validation interface.
    See Also:
    org.digijava.kernel.ampapi.helpers.geojson.belteshazzar.geojson.Validation
